content: **sizes** small circle scrubbie about 3 1/4 in 8 5 cm diameter large circle scrubbie about 4 1/2 in 11 5 cm diameter small granny square scrubbie about 3 1/4 in 8 5 cm square large granny square scrubbie about 4 1/2 in 11 5 cm square #099 coconut milk 1 ball a #158 cyber yellow 1 ball b #133 autumn maple 1 ball d #112 poppy red 1 ball d #195 cabernet 1 ball e #194 chartreuse 1 ball f #156 cabbage 1 ball g notes 1 scrubbies are worked in joined rnds with rs always facing do not turn at beg of rnds 2 small scrubbies are worked with smaller hook and one strand of yarn large scrubbies are worked with larger hook and 2 strands of yarn held together 3 circle scrubbie is worked in a single yarn color granny square scrubbie is worked with a different yarn color for each round 4 all yarn colors should be used as desired use whichever yarn colors you prefer for each scrubbie and round 5 yarn quantities are sufficient to make about 14 scrubbies 4 small and 3 large granny square scrubbies 3 small and 4 large circle scrubbies 6 to change yarn color fasten_off old color and join new color as instructed to help keep granny square scrubbies square join in a different corner each time you join a new yarn color
